The '''Farrokhzadan Journals''' are a set of interactable notes found west of [[Sumeru City]], [[Sumeru]].

The journals relate back to [[Lunja]] and the [[Farrokhzadan]], a faction of [[The Eremites]] who have been hired to capture [[Aranara]].<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Starry Night Chapter}}</ref>

==Dialogue==
===Farrokhzadan Journal (I)===
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Farrokhzadan Journal (I):''' "...Lunja had a big deal with some [[Snezhnaya|snow land]] merchants in [[Port Ormos]]. Helped them dispose of a traitor or something. Anyway, we made a fortune..."
:'''Farrokhzadan Journal (I):''' "...That was enough for us to rest a few months. And to celebrate, Lunja brought us here to play [[Genius Invokation TCG]], some most trending game in town..."
:'''Farrokhzadan Journal (I):''' "...Don't know why she's so drawn to the city chic. But considering how we ended up playing dice last time, we all had a bad feeling about this..."
{{Dialogue end}}

===Farrokhzadan Journal (II) ===
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Farrokhzadan Journal (II):''' "...As expected, Lunja's terrible luck poured months' worth of payments into the game..."
:'''Farrokhzadan Journal (II):''' "...We practically lost our shirt! Those cheats from Golden Mouse drove us out. We had to come here to camp first..."
:'''Farrokhzadan Journal (II):''' "...The air was damp and the fuel for our weapons was running low, but Lunja was cheerful as usual and said she smelled big business..."
:'''Farrokhzadan Journal (II):''' "...[[Ziri]] was there weeping since the gold axe he ordered was ruined. His relationship with [[Ahangar]]'s foster daughter was probably doomed as well. I had to give him a punch in the face to stop the wailing..."
{{Dialogue end}}

===Farrokhzadan Journal (III)===
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Farrokhzadan Journal (III):''' "...Our family sent people to inform us of the search of... '{{not a typo|Alanara}}', or '{{not a typo|Nanorara}}'? And they asked us to act before the spy from the snowy land. Honestly, I don't understand what they meant..."
:'''Farrokhzadan Journal (III):''' "...but [[Siman Farrokhzad|Siman]], the daughter of the legendary Agha Farrokh, has rallied the tribe to offer a reward for this. That means this 'Ananana' must be extremely important. We need to get it first..."
:'''Farrokhzadan Journal (III):''' "...Lunja was so excited that she kept rattling about it all night, and thanks to that, we couldn't fall asleep either. Ugh, I'm so sleepy now..."
{{Dialogue end}}
